title: EarCandy UI SFX PACK 2
description: Total 171 User Interface SFX: Crisp & Concise
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Elevate your app and game development with ''EarCandy UI SFX PACK 2'', a meticulously curated collection of 171 high-quality sound effects. Designed for the discerning developer, this pack features an array of very soft, short, and tiny UI sound effects that will bring a delicate touch of sophistication to your user interface.


Product Details:


Total Files: 171

Format: WAV

Quality: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit

Categories: ShortTone, LongTone, MultiTone

ShortTone: These are the subtle clicks, pops, and dings with minimal sustain, perfect for immediate feedback without overwhelming the user experience.


LongTone: For notifications that need to linger just a bit longer, like bell alerts, these sounds have a relatively longer sustain, ensuring they’re noticed but not intrusive.


MultiTone: Comprising two or more melodic notes, these quick tune mnemonics are ideal for memorable alerts and actions, adding a layer of engagement to your UI.


Every sound in the EarCandy UI SFX PACK 2 is unique, ensuring your project stands out. The sounds are ready to be implemented into your game design workflow, saving you time and effort in post-production.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  ShortTone SFX - 42
  •  MultiTone SFX - 118
  •  LongTone SFX - 5

Number of Audio Waves: 171

Number of Audio Cues: 171

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4:16

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Extra Silences removed from all files. 6 SFX added.
